project1.title: Penterest
project1.description: The sixth exercise at NSS. The objective of the exercise was to create a site similar to Pinterest. This project was our introduction to Firebase, Axios, and CRUD.
project1.technologiesUsed: Javascript, Firebase, Axios, JQuery, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Tamagotchi
project2.description: Tamagotchi was our first time using webpack and SCSS. The objective was to create an app inspired by the popular 90s game.
project2.technologiesUsed: Webpack, SCSS, Javascript, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Bozo University
project3.description: Group project to create admin panel for a clown college. Thanks Michael, Nick, and Matt. I was responsible for the Lessons page.
project3.technologiesUsed: Javascript, Firebase, Axios, JQuery, Version Control with Github

project4.title: Sweatys
project4.description: Group project to create an online store for sweatpants. Thanks Matt, Billy, and Pete. I was responsible for the reviews page.
project4.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Version Control with Github
